title: Add Two Numbers
description: The code is supposed to take two numbers as input and print their sum.
buggy_code:
def add_numbers(a, b)
    result = a + b
    print("The sum is: " result)

add_numbers(5 7)
fixed_code:
def add_numbers(a, b):
    result = a + b
    print("The sum is:", result)

add_numbers(5, 7)

title: Check Even or Odd
description: This code should check whether a number is even or odd.
buggy_code:
number = 10

if number % 2 = 0:
    print("Even")
else
    print("Odd")
